arabic: اِنَّا لِلَّهِ وَ اِنَّا اِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُوْنَ رِضًا بِقَضَائِهِ وَ تَسْلِيْمًا لِأَمْرِهِ
translation: Say the following while you are moving forward and backward seven times
Verily we are Allah’s and verily unto Him we return. We are happy with His will and carry out His command
transliteration: innā lillāhi wa innā ilayhi rāji`ūna riḍan biqaḍā-ihi wa taslīman li-amrih
